thread.title: Cops fatally shoot man who allegedly opened fire on them
thread.title_full: Cops fatally shoot man who allegedly opened fire on them

author: THOMAS TRACY
title: Cops fatally shoot man who allegedly opened fire on them
text:
Cops fatally shoot man who allegedly opened fire on them in Brooklyn Cops fatally shoot man who allegedly opened fire on them When cops tried to stop the suspect, he pointed the weapon at the officers, sparking the firefight, with him and cops firing at each other, police sources said. (kali9/Getty Images/iStockphoto) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Thursday, February 16, 2017, 4:52 PM 
Cops shot a man to death during a furious exchange of gunfire in Brooklyn Thursday, officials said. 
Members of the 75th Precinct Anti-Crime Squad was patrolling Belmont Ave. near Logan St. in East New York when they saw a man with a gun. 
When cops tried to stop the suspect, he pointed the weapon at the officers, sparking the firefight, with him and cops firing at each other, police sources said. 
The gunman was hit but managed to run into a nearby apartment building, where he collapsed in a stairwell. 
S.C. man allegedly planned shooting in 'spirit of Dylann Roof' 
No cops were hit by gunfire. 
The man died at the scene with the gun by his side, sources said. His name was not immediately released. Tags:
